meanings.definition: A small horse, typically under 14.2 hands high.
meanings.sent1: I rode a pony at the farm.
meanings.sent2: The children enjoyed a pony ride at the fair.
meanings.sent3: The pony in the race was so tiny, it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a pony racing towards the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The pony's gentle eyes and soft mane captured my heart.
